# Install

```bash
pip install cloudpickle==1.2.1
pip install gym[atari,box2d,classic_control]~=0.15.3
pip install ipython
pip install joblib
pip install matplotlib==3.1.1
pip install mpi4py
pip install numpy
pip install pandas
pip install pytest
pip install psutil
pip install scipy
pip install seaborn==0.8.1
pip install tensorflow>=1.8.0,<2.0
pip install torch==1.3.1
pip install tqdm
```
